Texto: 
liver transplant
nodular liver
splenomegaly 
splenorenal venous shunt
primary biliary cirrhosis
any of the causes for cirrhosis to include;
alcohol abuse
hepatitis c
hepatitis b
primary sclerosing cholangitis
chronic right heart failure
idiopathic
incidental finding of alkaline phosphatase elevation  followed by jaundice.
